field.name: summary
field.value: ResolveAll<T> resolves every type registered in the container

field.name: description
field.value: When I call Container.ResolveAll<T>() every registered type is instantiated independent of if it implements T.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: Please provide a testcase. Does that affect v2.0 as well?

comment.author: mausch
comment.text: RC3 doesn't even have a ResolveAll method. See http://fisheye2.atlassian.com/browse/castleproject/tags/1.0.x-RC3/InversionOfControl/Castle.Windsor/WindsorContainer.cs?r=4183

comment.author: mausch
comment.text: I've attached a testcase, this is working just fine for me in Windsor 2.0

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: As reported by Mauricio, this is working as expected.
